MS MCQs

    Decide when to implement Direct Routing for Teams

    »

    1. Which of the following statements is a benefit of Direct Routing?

      You want to prevent users from making calls outside your organization.

      Users can have individual dial-in numbers.

      Skype for Business users can make PSTN calls.


    2. When planning the Emergency Routing Service with Direct Routing, what should you check?

      That your network can support Emergency Routing.

      That your Session Border Controller supports Emergency Routing.

      That you have enough service numbers.


    3. What’s the difference between a subscriber number and a service number?

      Service numbers are designed to handle a higher call concurrency rate.

      Subscriber numbers are designed to handle a high call concurrency rate.

      Subscriber and service numbers have the same call concurrency rate.
